predicate.note: Frames file for 'restrain' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, comparison with prevent.

example.name: split secondary agent/action
example.text: Sea Containers said the offer will proceed after the Bermuda Supreme Court lifts or modifies an interim injunction restraining the company from buying its shares.

example.name: only secondary action
example.text: Dun & Bradstreet noted that price competition in its Nielsen Marketing Research, Nielsen Clearing House and Donnelley Marketing businesses also restrained revenue growth.
example.arg: price competition in its Nielsen Marketing Research, Nielsen Clearing House and Donnelley Marketing businesses
